doc.title: Easy Entertaining with Michael Chiarello
doc.plot: In his Emmy-winning Food Network series, chef Michael Chiarello helps viewers take the stress out of entertaining & allow the host time to enjoy the party, too. With specific advice and kitchen techniques, he shows how to develop a theme, break down menus, prep dishes in advance, cook gourmet recipes like a pro, and make creative presentations to pull it all together. From intimate weeknight dinners to large celebrations, Michael teaches how to make every meal not just delicious but memorable.
